description: Styles for a todo list application frontend, defining layout, colors, and component styles.

classes.name: container
classes.description: Class defining the main layout container for the todo list application.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Class for styling the header section of the todo list.

classes.name: task-form
classes.description: Class for the form where users can input new tasks.

classes.name: input-group
classes.description: Flex container for grouping input fields.

classes.name: input-field
classes.description: Styles for individual input fields in the task form.

classes.name: todo-list
classes.description: Grid layout for displaying the list of todo items.

classes.name: todo-item
classes.description: Individual styled container for each todo item.

classes.name: todo-content
classes.description: Container for the content of the todo item.

classes.name: completed
classes.description: Styles for completed todo items, indicating they are done.
